net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.handler

Class AbstractMouseDragHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.gwt.widgets.handler.AbstractMouseDragHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseDownHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseMoveHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseUpHandler, com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, com.google.gwt.user.client.Event.NativePreviewHandler, AbstractCustomHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PopupMouseHandler, UiWidgetAdapterGwtTableColumn.ResizeHandler

    public abstract class AbstractMouseDragHandler
extends Object
implements com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseDownHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseUpHandler, com.google.gwt.event.dom.client.MouseMoveHandler, com.google.gwt.user.client.Event.NativePreviewHandler, AbstractCustomHandler
    This is the abstract base class for a handler that allows moving or resizing with the mouse.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Field Summary

      The initial x position while dragging the mouse.
      private int mouseY
      The initial y position while dragging the mouse.

      The HandlerRegistration for the global mouse-listener registration while dragging or null.

      • isActive

        protected boolean isActive()
        This method can be overridden for dynamic activation of this handler.
        Returns:
        true if this handler is active, false if it is inactive (ignores all events and does nothing).

      • onMouseMove

        protected abstract void onMouseMove(int deltaX,
                                    int deltaY,
                                    com.google.gwt.dom.client.NativeEvent nativeEvent)
        Parameters:
        deltaX - is the relative movement of the mouse position on X-axis.
        deltaY - is the relative movement of the mouse position on Y-axis.
        nativeEvent - is the NativeEvent that triggered this invocation.
        See Also:
        onMouseMove(MouseMoveEvent)

      • onMouseUp

      • register

        public void register(com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget widget,
                     HandlerRegistrationCollector collector)
        This method registers this custom handler in the given Widget. It will also ensure that the Widget is properly configured to send the required events (e.g. via sends).
        Specified by:
        register in interface AbstractCustomHandler
        Parameters:
        widget - is the Widget where to register this handler.
        collector - is the HandlerRegistrationCollector where to collect the HandlerRegistration(s) of the registered handlers. May be null to ignore all registrations.
